S.FORM: 24 Ka kytt'ei, ka ni-mæhpyt ta rouar ka irang tou vaoung, k'ma-appa-hynna ka ni-ou-halap ki roung-wal ta avang: Teni-râ ta ni-merip.
25 Ka rou iroua ta Pæhtatæutæu-en tyn, ni-pa-patti-mæuæh tyni-æn, koun, Meirang, ka-ding-ou-kame, kou mapapatei kytta.

26 Ka ni-massousou neini-æn, Ka oumang ka mah-takout kamouemoumi ka ouffyng ki tnamsing-an? Nda ka ni-æhpit ta teni ni-patym-hgan tyn ta vare vaoung-appa: ka ouhang-ato palungpung [ka ni-äousi ki sypau.]
27 Ka ni-mouh-kiap ta tau, koun, Mamang ta teni k'atta, ka milligh tyni-æn ta vare vaoung-appa?

28 Irou ka ni-mou-arough ta teni tou pourough ki Gergesenen, ni-mæuæuäkla tyni-æn rarouha ki ni-ou-Lyttou, ka rava-ravak, ka ni-malouaf maplæh, k'ma-appa-hynna ka assi hma-lylpough hmari-vat ta timamang ki darang k'anna.
29 Ka kytt'ei ni-mako-langæh ta neni, koun, Mang-amien ymhou-appa Jesus ka Alak ki Alid? Irouato kow hia parping
